MY PERSONAL HALF LIFE 2 FAV!!!!!!! THE HOSPITAL PART WAS AWESOME THE MUSIC IS BLASTING AND MY SHOTGUN IS BLASTING EVEN HARDER!!

[h1]More of the same[/h1]
I love Half-Life 1 and like Half-Life 2 but this was just fine. It was just more of the same, which is fine for almost everyone, but there was just something missing for me. Everything that is good about 2 is still here and it doesn't create new major problems, but it also doesn't fix anything of the problems.

The story is not very good either for me. It felt kind of redundant even though I liked 2's story and wanted to know what happens to the characters, maybe the pacing is off or something, I don't know. 

Level design is also a huge step down compared to 2's. A lot of it is running around with Alyx and waiting for her to do stuff, at least in the first half. I didn't like the Citadel part in 2 and now you start with it for the first half.

But then again, it was decently fun to play through and if you like Half-Life 2 then you can't go wrong with this.
[h3]Rating[/h3]
7/10

Период полураспада, Период полураспада 2...вполне возможно, это лучшие игры в жанре FPS, когда-либо созданные. Эпизод первый-это просто еще одна такая же фантастическая игра. Плюс дополнительный бонус от игры на стороне Аликс с превосходным ИИ. И добавило отличное настроение грубо за 3 ч за один поход в игре можно все достижения получить :p
Как и предыдущие части серии, СУПЕР!
Está muy bueno, y para ser el episodio de un juego completo, tiene una duración para mí bastante aceptable
Игра проходится за 3 часа. Почему я проходил дольше? Сидел час в меню и слушал Кляйнера.

A bit shorter than the original Half-Life 2, but that was to be expected since this is supposed to be an episodic game. The gameplay has not changed since the previous entry, which is fine. However, the concept of having Alyx along feels like a giant escort mission. At least there were moments were I would be alone, and that Alyx would fight well enough without having me to metaphorically carry her.
This is a good continuation from the cliff hanger of HL2.

Interesante poder continuar con el final de Half Life2, decepciona un poco que sea tan solo de algunos capítulos, pero realmente entretiene, el suspenso y de alguna forma cerrar una parte del ciclo ayudando a los demás ciudadanos a salir de la ciudad. Es evidente que lo recomiendo ampliamente!
Fisica do jogo Top de mais

ATTENZIONE!
OGNI OPINIONE ESPRESSA E' DEL TUTTO PERSONALE!

Dopo la fine di quel capolavoro di Half life 2 (a cui ho dato un meritatissimo 10), ecco che le vicende continuano.
Sarò breve, anche perchè tutto l'impianto narrativo e atmosferico l'ho spiegato nella recensione di HL2.
HL2 ep 1 è molto corto e racconterà le vicende di Gordon ed Alyx esattamente dopo la fine di HL2, e vedrà i nostri eroi alle prese con la fuga da City 17. 
La storia è sempre interessante seppur senza nessun guizzo spettacolare, ma comunque ci da un assaggio di ciò che è avvenuto dopo HL2, in questa bellissima storia (di cui spero di vedere un finale prima o poi).

Il gameplay è rimasto tale e quale e ripeterei le stesse identiche cose già dette nella recensione precedente.

Se avete apprezzato quel capolavoro di HL2 e volete vedere come prosegue, prendetelo ad occhi chiusi.

PRO:
- Tutto ciò che c'era di buono in Half Life 2
- Gameplay sempre divertente

CONTRO:
- Durata infima
- Pochi contenuti e situazioni di grande spessore

Voto: 8
dobra gra tylko czasami zombi mogą wkvrwić
